sql-select.name: GetInstanceQueryExecutionMonth
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT strftime('%Y%m', h.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUName] ,strftime('%Y%m', h.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,'#080808' AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,date(MIN(h.[EventDay]),'start of month') AS [EventDayMin] ,date(MIN(h.[EventDay]),'start of month','+1 month','-1 day') AS [EventDayMax] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceExecQuery] h INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = h.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE h.[EventTime] > ( SELECT DATETIME(MAX(h.[EventTime]), @strDateTimeModifier) FROM [hist].[h_InstanceExecQuery] h INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = h.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id ) GROUP BY strftime('%Y%m', h.[EventDay]) ORDER BY strftime('%Y%m', h.[EventDay]) DESC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceQueryExecutionDays
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT strftime('%Y%m%d', h.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUName] ,strftime('%Y%m%d', h.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,CASE WHEN (strftime('%w', h.[EventDay]) = '0') THEN '#CC0000' ELSE '#080808' END AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,MIN(h.[EventDay]) AS [EventDayMin] ,MAX(h.[EventDay]) AS [EventDayMax] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceExecQuery] h INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = h.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE h.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) GROUP BY strftime('%Y%m%d', h.[EventDay]) ORDER BY strftime('%Y%m%d', h.[EventDay]) DESC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceQueryExecution
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT CASE WHEN ((MAX(hIEQBase.[execution_count]) IS NOT NULL) AND (MAX(hIEQBase.[execution_count]) <= MAX(hIEQ.[execution_count]))) THEN MAX(hIEQ.[execution_count]) - MAX(hIEQBase.[execution_count]) ELSE MAX(hIEQ.[execution_count]) END AS [execution_count] ,CASE WHEN ((MAX(hIEQBase.[total_worker_time]) IS NOT NULL) AND (MAX(hIEQBase.[total_worker_time]) <= MAX(hIEQ.[total_worker_time]))) THEN MAX(hIEQ.[total_worker_time]) - MAX(hIEQBase.[total_worker_time]) ELSE MAX(hIEQ.[total_worker_time]) END AS [total_worker_time] ,CASE WHEN ((MAX(hIEQBase.[total_elapsed_time]) IS NOT NULL) AND (MAX(hIEQBase.[total_elapsed_time]) <= MAX(hIEQ.[total_elapsed_time]))) THEN MAX(hIEQ.[total_elapsed_time]) - MAX(hIEQBase.[total_elapsed_time]) ELSE MAX(hIEQ.[total_elapsed_time]) END AS [total_elapsed_time] ,CASE WHEN ((MAX(hIEQBase.[total_logical_reads]) IS NOT NULL) AND (MAX(hIEQBase.[total_logical_reads]) <= MAX(hIEQ.[total_logical_reads]))) THEN MAX(hIEQ.[total_logical_reads]) - MAX(hIEQBase.[total_logical_reads]) ELSE MAX(hIEQ.[total_logical_reads]) END AS [total_logical_reads] ,CASE WHEN ((MAX(hIEQBase.[total_logical_writes]) IS NOT NULL) AND (MAX(hIEQBase.[total_logical_writes]) <= MAX(hIEQ.[total_logical_writes]))) THEN MAX(hIEQ.[total_logical_writes]) - MAX(hIEQBase.[total_logical_writes]) ELSE MAX(hIEQ.[total_logical_writes]) END AS [total_logical_writes] ,hSID.[DatabaseName] AS [DatabaseName] ,hIEQT.[ExecQueryText] AS [ExecQueryText] ,MIN(hIEQ.[EventTime]) AS [EventTimeMin] ,MAX(hIEQ.[EventTime]) AS [EventTimeMax] ,@d_ServerInstance_id AS [d_ServerInstance_id] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceExecQuery] hIEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN [hist].[h_InstanceExecQuery] hIEQBase ON hIEQBase.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hIEQ.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hIEQBase.[DatabaseID] = hIEQ.[DatabaseID] AND hIEQBase.[ExecQueryId] = hIEQ.[ExecQueryId] AND hIEQBase.[EventDay] = CASE WHEN (@EventDayMin IS NOT NULL) THEN date(@EventDayMin, '-1 day') ELSE date('1900-01-01') END LEFT OUTER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] hSID ON hSID.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hIEQ.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSID.[DatabaseId] = hIEQ.[DatabaseID] INNER JOIN [hist].[h_InstanceExecQueryText] hIEQT ON hIEQT.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hIEQ.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hIEQT.[ExecQueryId] = hIEQ.[ExecQueryId] INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hIEQ.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE CASE WHEN ((@EventDayMin IS NOT NULL) AND (@EventDayMax IS NOT NULL)) THEN hIEQ.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) WHEN (@strDateTimeModifier IS NOT NULL) THEN hIEQ.[EventTime] > ( SELECT DATETIME(MAX(hIEQ.[EventTime]), @strDateTimeModifier) FROM [hist].[h_InstanceExecQuery] hIEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] hSID ON hSID.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hIEQ.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSID.[rowid] = hIEQ.[DatabaseID] INNER JOIN [hist].[h_InstanceExecQueryText] hIEQT ON hIEQT.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hIEQ.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hIEQT.[ExecQueryId] = hIEQ.[ExecQueryId] INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hIEQ.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id ) ELSE hIEQ.[EventDay] = date('1900-01-01') END GROUP BY hSID.[DatabaseName] ,hIEQT.[ExecQueryText] HAVING CASE WHEN ((MAX(hIEQBase.[execution_count]) IS NOT NULL) AND (MAX(hIEQBase.[execution_count]) <= MAX(hIEQ.[execution_count]))) THEN MAX(hIEQ.[execution_count]) - MAX(hIEQBase.[execution_count]) ELSE MAX(hIEQ.[execution_count]) END > 0 ORDER BY 1 DESC LIMIT 1000 ;
